text:
Once, under the influence of Sage Narad, Kartikeya had gone to the Kraunch Mountain to do penance.
 Shiva and Parvati could not bear the pain of his separation for long.
 Both of them went to the Kraunch mountain to see him.
 When Kartikeya saw them coming he moved to some other place.
 When lord Shiva saw this he established himself in the form of Jyotirlinga, which later on became famous as Mallikarjuna jyotirlinga.
title: The Origin of Mallikarjuna
